basic.description:
Evidence for relativistic effects. Kinematics and dynamics in special relativity, space-time diagrams, applications. Evidence for quanta, spectra, Bohr atom. Introduction to the Schroedinger equation.
RECOMMENDATION    A minimum grade of C in PHYS 104/6.0 or PHYS 106/6.0.
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: Relativity and Quanta

extra.enrollment_requirement: (APSC111 AND APSC112) OR PHYS104 OR PHYS104 OR PHYS106 OR PHYS106
